title: Bug 49890Nio Selector issue on linux platform
description:
Bug 49890Nio Selector issue on linux platform

Created attachment 25997 [details]NioEndpoint.java and simple web applicationsometimes ,server's cpu reaches 100%,and keep 100% all the time,until restartthe server.Reproduced with java versions: 1.6.007,1.6.018, 1.6.021.It is duplicate of issue: Bug 46373.It seams that Jetty guys fixed that problem: http://jira.codehaus.org/browse/JETTY937?focusedCommentId=168060&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:commenttabpanel.I added some logging to NioEndpoint.java.
EB: The issue can be reproduced by repeatedly sending multiple requests to the web application, for example by continuously pressing the F5 key in a browser.
